content_gaps: Most competitors focus heavily on Ontario regulated market - opportunity to better serve non-Ontario Canadian players
Limited coverage of crypto payment options popular with offshore sites
Shallow mobile experience reviews - opportunity for detailed app UX analysis
Missing comparison of offshore vs provincial operators with clear pros/cons
No interactive comparison tools or calculators
Limited discussion of banking options specific to Canadian players (Interac, e-transfers)
Insufficient coverage of popular Canadian sports (CFL, NHL focus)
Missing provincial-specific betting information beyond Ontario
No discussion of responsible gambling resources specific to Canada
Limited discussion of cryptocurrency betting options
compliance_notes: Canada-specific: Legal age varies by province (18+ in AB, MB, QC; 19+ in most others). Focus on offshore operators for non-Ontario market. Must address provincial regulations.
